sensor_network.requests

Class ExecutionState

  • java.lang.Object
    • sensor_network.requests.ExecutionState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.requests.interfaces.ExecutionStateI, java.io.Serializable

    public class ExecutionState
extends java.lang.Object
implements fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.requests.interfaces.ExecutionStateI
    This class represents the state of execution for a query in a sensor network. It contains information about the current processing node, query results, directionality of the query, maximum distance for query propagation, number of hops remaining, set of directions, and executed nodes.

    This class implements the ExecutionStateI interface.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
